jobDescription: Job DetailsLevel EntryJob Location Riverdale Early Childhood Center - Riverdale, NYPosition Type Full TimeEducation Level High SchoolJob Shift DayJob Category EducationDescription The One-to-One Aide will provide support and coverage to one child under the guidance and supervision of the Lead Classroom Teacher.
